snippet: Works from the George Embiricos estate will be at auction at Sotheby’s next month; Picasso’s family sets up a formal authentication process; and two Chelsea galleries are opening new spaces.
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; Sotheby's November auctions will feature 11 works from the estate of Greek collector and shipping magnate George Embiricos; four heirs of Pablo Picasso have formed an organization dedicated to authenticating the artist's work; details are emerging in the expansions of the Andrea Rosen Gallery and the Hauser & Wirth gallery, both in the Chelsea neighborhood of Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: Works from the George Embiricos estate will be at auction at Sotheby’s next month; Picasso’s family sets up a formal authentication process; and two Chelsea galleries are opening new spaces.

headline.seo: Cézanne, Picasso and Bacon Works for Sale
headline.main: Embiricos Collection Is Selling Some Works
headline.print_headline: Embiricos Collection Is Selling Some Works
